title: 1893 8x10 mounted photo Brooklyn Minor League team
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1893 8x10 mounted photo Brooklyn Minor League team
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dylan
8x10 photo backed on cardboard (i have little experience in photos) of Minor league team issued in 1893, as i was told by Jim Manos. Team name, "Brooklyn Edison" shown on uniforms of players. Upper right hand corner is missing small piece. There is a seperation running through the middle of the photograph which can be seen. If the photo was backed with new cardboard the split could be eliminated I imagine. The image is sharp, and the photo is overall pretty clean. There are no pen/pencil markings and almost no creasing. The imperfections are pretty much outside of the image of the ballplayers except for the split. A high resolution scan can be emailed. Any reasonable offer wont be refused. email at bgspsa1@yahoo.com
[URL="http://img80.imageshack.us/my.php?image=emailhr8.jpg"][IMG]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/9601/emailhr8.th.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

posts.post_title: 1893 8x10 mounted photo Brooklyn Minor League team
posts.post_content:
Posted By: barrysloate
Dylan- CdV's weren't around in 1893. It's a mounted albumen photo of some kind, but not a CdV. CdV's are roughly the size of a baseball card, not 8 x 10.
